pr_title: Archive openj9-docs if ARCHIVE_JAVADOC is set

timeline.bodyText: As I had another look at this today, I noticed that this message is missing the closing single quote just like line 384: could you fix both, please?
timeline.author: keithc-ca

timeline.message:
